title: Breastfeeding for One, Two, or Three, A Nursing Mother's Survival Guide for One Child, Twins, Triplets, or More
features: This guide has straightforward, real life steps and examples from a Mom who breastfed her triplets until 14 months and is still nursing her 14 month old baby!

From the Author of "Potty Time for One Child, Twins, or Triplets" This book has what you need: Tips, Tricks, and Testimony; Caring for Mom Tips; Motivation Tips; Problem Solving Tips; Informative Links.
This is a practical guide without a lot of theory or psychology, for expectant families or parents of one, two, or three children at a time. This is reality!
description: I wish I had read this book when I was trying to nurse my triplets! Great tips, easy instructions. --Lori McGinnis, Mom to 20 -month old triplets and a 10-year old daughter, and Author of Are you ready? There's Three!
